collectible.title: Remilia's Wineglass
collectible.subtitle: The wineglass Remilia was drinking out of during the game.
collectible.text: An exceedingly ordinary wineglass, presumably owned by Remilia Scarlet. Impressively caught by the dealer during the game. For some reason, they insisted that you take it with you. It has a faint, indescribable smell. You can't quite tell what was in it.
